overview:
Peter S.H. Grubstein is a founder and a Managing Director of NGEN. Prior to establishing NGEN in 2000, Mr. Grubstein made diverse investments with a number of firms, ranging from venture capital to LBOs and leveraged recapitalizations. Successful exits for Mr. Grubstein include U.S. Labs, AnaServe, Carolina Steel, Premiere Video and Kenfil.

Before becoming an investor, Mr. Grubstein gained operating experience as President of the American Tanning Company, working in both Germany and the U.S. Mr. Grubstein is currently a member of the Board of Directors of Hycrete, Renaissance Lighting and Textronics (Chairman). He is an observer on the Board of Konarka Technologies, and serves on the Advisory Board of the Cleantech Venture Network.

A graduate of Yale College, Class of 1977, he received a BA degree and was a well-regarded and successful oarsman, winning the Intercollegiate Rowing Association Championship in a pair-oared shell with coxswain.
